SELECT t.*,pp.id as pp_id,pp.starting_time,pp.termination_years,pp.department,pp.any_position,pp.note, ce.id,ce.time,ce.certificate,ce.content_grades,ce.organizer,ec.certificate,ec.id,ec.organizational_units, ec.race_name,ec.time,ec.which,gst.certificate,gst.gain_success,gst.id,gst.name,gst.study_guides,gst.time, pc.classes,pc.id,pc.name,pc.proof_materials,pc.time,rt.certificate,rt.id,rt.qrganizational_unit,rt.time, rt.working_capacity,ts.certificate,ts.concluding_situation,ts.course_name,ts.id,ts.project_department, ts.time,ts.undertake_task,th.id as th_id,th.honor,mgp.id as mgp_id,mgp.name,mgp.time,mgp.my_educational_philosophy, mgp.self_analysis,mgp.my_growth_plan,pgp.id as pgp_id,pgp.name,pgp.planning_time,pgp.growth_plan,pgp.self_testId, pgp.Conclusion_reflections as pgp_Conclusion_reflections,puc.id as puc_id,puc.time,puc.name,puc.classes,puc.proof_materials, rtd.id as ret_id,rtd.time,rtd.working_capacity,rtd.qrganizational_unit,rtd.certificate,ecn.id as ecn_id,ecn.time,ecn.race_name, ecn.which,ecn.organizational_units,ecn.certificate,tss.id as tss_id,tss.time,tss.course_name,tss.project_department, tss.undertake_task,tss.concluding_situation,tss.certificate,pw.id as pw_id,pw.time,pw.title_dissertation,pw.own_part, pw.winning,pw.certificate,gsts.id as gsts_id,gsts.time,gsts.name,gsts.study_guides,gsts.gain_success,gsts.certificate, ced.id as ced_id,ced.time,ced.content_grades,ced.organizer,ced.certificate,fos.id as fos_id,fos.name
FROM teacher t,personal_profile pp,continue_education ce,education_competition ec,guide_students_teachers gst, public_class pc,research_test rt,teaching_subjects ts,title_honor th,master_growth_plan mgp, phased_growth_planning pgp,public_class puc,research_test rtd,education_competition ecn, teaching_subjects tss,paper_works pw,guide_students_teachers gsts,continue_education ced,formal_schooling fos WHERE t.Personal_profile_id=pp.id AND t.continue_educationid=ce.id AND t.education_competitionid=ec.id AND t.guide_students_teachersid=gst.id AND t.public_classid=pc.id AND t.research_testid=rt.id AND t.teaching_subjectsid=ts.id AND t.title_honorId=th.id and t.master_growth_planid=mgp.id and public_classid=puc.id and research_testid=rtd.id and t.education_competitionid=ecn.id and t.teaching_subjectsid=tss.id and t.guide_students_teachersid=gsts.id and t.continue_educationid=ced.id and t.phased_growth_planningid=pgp.id and t.paper_worksid=pw.id and t.education=fos.id and t.id=#{id}
